sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>When Mr. Walker want to add variables to a notification, he can easily do that with a mail script (+guide)</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group display_value="Hikon Professional Services" name="Hikon Professional Services">0ea124de4f6463007e72aa95d310c750</assignment_group> <category display_value="System">c1ad05924f2863007e72aa95d310c75f</category> <company display_value="INTU">98712c9e4f6463007e72aa95d310c75c</company> <description>Build a mail script to capture variables</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 00:00:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp>1970-01-01 00:00:00</estimated_hours_sp> <notes/> <number>TAS0001227</number> <package display_value="PACK0001020">88d712514f8523007e72aa95d310c748</package> <short_description>Add more information to e-mail</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>New</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-11-02 11:53:44</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5e2991554f65eb007e72aa95d310c7fc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>stephen.walker@intu.co.uk</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-11-02 12:15:06</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
